title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Developing Systematic Strategies to Strengthen Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design experience in language education and understanding of mobile learning environments
context.additional_context: A customized instructional design strategy development process for current practitioners, where participants develop mobile-based language learning design competencies based on real work cases

learning_goals: Learners can build an evaluation system for instructional design strategies using literature review techniques
Learners can develop a mobile microlearning design framework applicable in language education
Learners can propose instructional design solutions applicable to real work environments through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
